title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 263 - Stay Of Good Behavior Allowance
content:

§ 263.1 - Stay of good behavior allowance
§ 263.2 - Procedure for stay of good behavior allowance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 263

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§112, 137, 803

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
